profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

extracted_posts.post_content: We’re excited to share our biggest U.S. ad campaign ever, starring Will Ferrell. Check out Will’s journey of discovering that he can now shop with PayPal ‘everywhere’ – in stores and online all while earning rewards.https://lnkd.in/ghEeXUgs

PayPal is ushering in a new era, making it easier and more rewarding than ever to shop and pay with PayPal everywhere – both in stores and online – with PayPal Debit.

We’re expanding our rewards program and availability to give our customers a smart choice for every purchase. Customers can now access new and personalized ways to shop and manage their spending, including new 5% cash back rewards on up to $1,000 spend in a monthly category of their choosing with the PayPal Debit Card, stackable rewards in the PayPal app from hundreds of brands, and it’s faster to add the PayPal Debit Card to their mobile wallet in just a few taps to earn rewards with tap-to-pay in stores.

Learn more:https://lnkd.in/enxaf_ex

We’re excited to share the expansion of our strategic partnership withFiserv. Building on our longstanding collaboration, Fiserv merchants can now integrate PayPal,Venmoand other PayPal payment methods more seamlessly through their Commerce Hub. Additionally, Fiserv will introduce Fastlane by PayPal to accelerate guest checkout flows for U.S. merchants.

This#LaborDay, we’re proud to be recognized as one of the Top 10 Companies for Workers byJUST Capital. Our employees are the backbone of our business, and we’re grateful to be recognized for the efforts we’ve made in supporting them.#LaborDay2024

The PayPal USD stablecoin is part of PayPal's mission to revolutionize commerce globally. This weekend, we reached a major milestone: over $1 billion in market capitalization! This is just the beginning, and we’re excited to keep growing for the future.

We’re excited to announceAdyenasPayPal’s first Fastlane payment processor distribution partner. This partnership brings together our brand, trust and scale combined with Adyen’s customer base—to make PayPal available everywhere customers’ shop. This strategic partnership signifies how PayPal is evolving into a "platform of choice " by enabling other processors to thrive and achieve greater success.https://bit.ly/4cAA6LF

We’re delighted to team up withGlobal Citizenand work together to create positive change. We look forward to bringing our collaboration to life at the Global Citizen Festival this fall! Grab your PayPal Exclusive: General Admission today*!  
 
*For a limited time, tickets are available at $99 each, when you checkout with PayPal starting on August 16, 2024 at 10:00AM ET. Offer can be accessed via the Global Citizen Ticketmaster site. Subject to Ticketmaster terms and conditions. This offer may be modified at any time, limited tickets available.https://lnkd.in/eCyg9keh 59,475 followers BIG NEWS🚨 We’re thrilled to share that we are teaming up withPayPal! This collaboration will be an exciting step forward in our mission to drive positive change and amplify our impact – and we can’t wait to do it in lockstep with the PayPal team.  

To celebrate, we’re launching the PayPal Exclusive: General Admission tickets – on sale now for a special price! It’s just one way this collaboration is already bringing new and exciting opportunities to the table – for our organization and for Global Citizens around the world.  

Interested in learning more about General Admission tickets? Head over to this link:https://lnkd.in/e3Z24KYU

We’re excited to announce that PayPal is teaming up withUKGto offer the ability for U.S. employees to set up PayPal Direct Deposit through their employer’s payroll portal. U.S. employees paid through UKG Pro will be able to sign up for a PayPal Balance account and set up PayPal Direct Deposit by clicking the PayPal button on their employer’s payroll portal.  
 
Find out more:https://payp.al/ukg

Introducing Fastlane by PayPal, now available to U.S. businesses of all sizes using PayPal Braintree and PayPal Complete Payments. Fastlane is PayPal’s newest accelerated guest checkout solution, allowing shoppers to enjoy fast and low-friction purchases. 
 
Just in time for the holiday shopping season, Fastlane is easy to integrate and is here to help reduce guest checkout time, increase conversions and expand consumer reach.payp.al/fastlane

We reported second quarter 2024 results today, delivering strong performance that highlights the strength of PayPal’s global commerce platform. We’re making steady progress on our transformation to position the company for long-term, durable, and profitable growth, and we’re executing on the innovations we announced earlier this year. Thanks to the PayPal team for your tireless work to delight our customers every day!   
 
Read more about PayPal’s second quarter results:payp.al/Q2

What a day! The energy, purpose and teamwork throughout our global offices during PayPal Impact Day was palpable. A huge thank you to all the small businesses, nonprofits, Community Impact leaders and PayPal employees whose work made the day an overwhelming success. Watch some of the action from the day here.#PayPalImpactDay

Today is the first ever PayPal Impact Day. Our employees around the world are logging off their computers and rolling up their sleeves to pack goods from small businesses into supply kits for local nonprofits. We’re excited to come together with purpose to make an impact in the places where we live and work. Learn more about PayPal Impact Day here:https://lnkd.in/ggyR_Gu5#PayPalImpactDay

Srini VenkatesanjoinsPayPalon June 24 as our new Chief Technology Officer (CTO). In this role, Venkatesan will lead the development and implementation of technology across the entire PayPal ecosystem, including analytics and data science, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning, infrastructure operations, information security, and product engineering. Welcome, Srini!

We believe strong communities are essential for a thriving global economy. That’s why we're proud to announce the 2024 PayPal Community Impact Grant recipients!  

This year, 77 organizations across 22 countries have been selected to receive grant funding, volunteer support from PayPal employees, and pro bono resources. These grants are part of our ongoing commitment to revolutionize commerce globally by expanding economic opportunity for all. 

Each year, our employees play a pivotal role in this initiative by nominating local nonprofits that align with our mission. We are excited to support these organizations and extend our impact in the communities where we live and work. 

Learn more about some of this year’s grantees:https://bit.ly/3VrGAWu

In our most recent Global All Hands, President and CEOAlex Chrissnamed two colleagues as recipients of the inaugural PayPal Impact Award - our company’s highest honor presented to employees for going above and beyond to make a transformative impact on the business.Alison TicknerandYogesh Mishrawere nominated by their executives and recognized by Alex for demonstrating leadership in ways that motivate everyone around them. We are so grateful for your many contributions to PayPal, Alison and Yogesh – congratulations on your well-deserved recognition!

We are pleased to welcomeFrancis Ebongto the PayPal team as SVP, Chief Service Experience Officer. Francis will be accountable for elevating the customer service experience for our consumers and merchants globally.

We are excited to announce thatSteven Winokerwill join PayPal on May 15 as Senior Vice President, Chief Investor Relations Officer. Steve is a collaborative and trusted strategic advisor, who brings a wealth of experience working with companies during transitions. His broad expertise not only as an equity analyst, but also as an operator, makes him the right leader for this role.https://bit.ly/3y71lPj

We’re excited to share our 2023 PayPal Global Impact Report, which highlights our efforts from the past year to make a positive impact on the communities where we live and work. 🌎 
 
In 2023, we came together to serve our customers and make a difference within our communities by: 
- Providing small businesses with access to capital through financing solutions to help sustain and grow their operations.  
- Reducing our environmental impact 
- Enhancing our product offerings to support our customers’ financial well-being  
- Empowering our employees to give back to their local communities 
- Introducing new fraud protection services to keep our customers’ data safe 
 
Read our latest report ➡️https://bit.ly/3UQQeTI

We reported first quarter 2024 results today, delivering solid performance as we continue to drive forward our strategy. We’re still in the early days of our transformation, but we are executing with urgency to deliver customer-centric innovation and profitable growth. Listen to our conference call at 8:30 a.m. EDT atpypl.comand read our press release at the link below for full details. 

Read more about our first quarter results:payp.al/Q124

We’re excited to announce that Shaun Khalfan is joining PayPal today as Chief Information Security Officer. Shaun brings more than 20 years of experience in information security and risk management, including serving as Chief Information Security Officer with the U.S Department of Homeland Security, Discover Financial Services, Barclays International, and Freddie Mac.

We’re thrilled to announce thatAaron James Websterwill be joining PayPal as Executive Vice President, Chief Enterprise Services Officer on March 18. Aaron has extensive experience leading risk management and global operations for some of the world’s most recognized companies.https://bit.ly/3Pljmiu

We are excited to announce that Amy Bonitatibus has been named Chief Corporate Affairs and Communications Officer. Bonitatibus brings a wealth of experience leading communications in the financial services industry and deep expertise in reputation management to the role. She was most recently the Chief Communications Officer at Wells Fargo and previously served as Chief Communications Officer for Chase.https://lnkd.in/gSaFtyne

We are excited to announce thatGeoff Seeleyhas joined PayPal as Chief Marketing Officer. Seeley brings over 25 years in global brand, digital, and performance marketing, while building teams to drive transformative marketing models. Seeley was most recently the Global CMO and Communications Officer at Afterpay and in marketing at CashApp.https://lnkd.in/eBDxuf3x

PayPal reported fourth quarter and full year 2023 results today, delivering a solid quarter during the most important shopping season for our customers. Listen to our conference call at 2 p.m. PST athttp://pypl.comand read our press release at the link below for full details.http://payp.al/Q4
See all the innovations revealed in PayPal’s First Look showcase and discover what’s in store for PayPal and Venmo this year.https://bit.ly/3HzzKIa#PayPalFirstLook
It’s time ⏰ Tune in to our YouTube channel today at 9:30 a.m. PT for an exclusive preview of the new products PayPal and Venmo will introduce this year.#PayPalFirstLookyoutube.com/paypal

Ready to see how PayPal is revolutionizing commerce? Tune in tomorrow, Thursday, Jan. 25 at 9:30 am. PT, to see PayPal President and CEOAlex Chrissgive an exclusive preview of the first innovations PayPal and Venmo are piloting and bringing to market this year.youtube.com/paypal#PayPalFirstLook
More than 20 years ago, PayPal revolutionized commerce. CEOAlex Chrisswill preview how we're doing it again at#PayPalFirstLookon January 25 at 9:30 a.m. PT. Tune in on YouTube:youtube.com/paypal

As we reflect on 2023, we are inspired by the generosity our customers showed throughout the last year. Over 76 million global customers used PayPal to donate more than $21 billion to support nonprofits and causes around the world. We're proud to help power that impact and can’t wait to see the difference our community will make in 2024. Learn how you can donate here:https://bit.ly/3RPuTqI

We are proud to have recently been named as a top company for career growth by the 2023American Opportunity Index. We believe our employees are one of our most valuable assets, and we are honored to be recognized for our commitment to their career development and growth.#AmericanOpportunityIndexhttps://lnkd.in/g9GmD_5g

We’re proud to share that PayPal received a top score of 100 on theHuman Rights Campaign's Corporate Equality Index for the eighth consecutive year! We believe that diversity is our strength, and inclusion should be at the core of everything we do. We’re honored to be recognized for our efforts to champion LGBTQ+ equality and create a workplace where everyone can thrive.#CEI2023#Equality100https://lnkd.in/eyatdkp

At PayPal, we’re committed to harnessing the power of our technology and scale to support charities and help people give back to the causes they care about. We’re excited to share thatPayPal Giving Fundis expanding its partnership withMetato exclusively enable charitable giving on Facebook and Instagram in the US, UK, Australia and Canada. 
 
PayPal Giving Fund’s mission is to support charities by enabling them to benefit from new forms of giving. Charities will be able to raise money through fundraisers and donation buttons on Facebook and Instagram, and donations will be received by PayPal Giving Fund and granted to benefiting charities in accordance with its policies.https://lnkd.in/g5QKTwZ

PayPalreposted this President and CEO, PayPal "Cyber 5" are the most important shopping days of the year for our customers and our team worked around the clock to equip small businesses with the tools they need to make every possible sale and give shoppers the opportunity to buy gifts for their families while saving their hard-earned money. As we pull preliminary numbers from Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday, I'm feeling proud of the pivotal role thatPayPalplays in the world and the impact we’re having in our customers' lives:

🔵  We processed approximately 400M transactions
🔵  We put more than $8M back in our customers’ pockets with cash back and savings (more than $2M on Black Friday alone!)
🔵  Cyber Monday was the single largest shopping day of the year so far with approximately $5.8B in TPV and more than 87M transactions (61K transactions per minute!) 

Setting numbers aside, it makes it very real for us when we hear firsthand from entrepreneurs likeJanine Mastrorilliowner of New York-based handbag company Independent Reign, andLeon Leong 梁志康, founder of Singapore-based watchmaker BOLDR Supply Co. how critical this time has been for them and their gratitude for the role our team plays in supporting them 365 days/year. 
 
So to the PayPal team: THANK YOU for your hard work and dedication. We still have more work to do throughout peak season and beyond, but I’m grateful and encouraged by how we are delivering for our customers when it matters the most. 🙌

It's#GivingTuesday! We're continually inspired by the PayPal community's spirit of generosity. Last year, PayPal processed more than 20 billion dollars in donations. 

As we enter the holiday giving season, we’re providing more ways for people to connect and give to the causes they care about. Whether you’re contributing to a community fundraiser, discovering a new charity to support, or making a micro-donation at checkout, Giving Tuesday and the holiday season is a time to help however you can.

Learn more herehttps://bit.ly/47RTKkb

Happy#SmallBusinessSaturday! Small businesses are an essential part of our communities, and we’re grateful for the small business owners worldwide who choose PayPal to power their businesses. Visit your favorite local business today to celebrate and support all that they do for their communities.

Today we announced the addition of several new leaders as we position PayPal for its next phase of growth.Isabel Cruzwill join PayPal as Chief People Officer. Michelle Gill is joining PayPal as EVP, General Manager of a newly formed Small Business and Financial Services Group.Diego Scottiwill join PayPal as EVP, General Manager of a newly formed Consumer Group and Global Marketing and Communications organization.

Our new executive team reflects our commitment to building a high-performing organization that will create the best possible products and experiences for our customers.

Learn more here:https://lnkd.in/g7VNfCxx

Today we introduced Venmo Groups, the newest feature arriving in the app so users can conveniently track, manage, and settle up multiple expenses among groups like friends, family, roommates, partners, sports leagues and more. Read more here:https://venmo.me/groups

During November, our Serve Employee Resource Group for Veterans and allies celebrates Veterans Month to show appreciation for all those who have served their country. To kick off the month, PayPal President and CEOAlex Chrissshared a special video message with Serve about his personal connection to the community and to thank members for their service.

Our Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) are at the heart of our culture. We recently welcomed our global ERG leaders to San Jose for an engaging and inspiring leadership summit that focused on navigating change and driving impact. Our President and CEOAlex Chrissjoined to discuss the essential role ERGs play in building culture and how best to support these vital communities. Thank you to all our ERG leaders for all you do!

PayPal reported its third quarter results today demonstrating continued progress against our strategic initiatives.https://payp.al/Q3EarningsAlex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “My first 30 days leading PayPal have confirmed my belief in the company's strong assets and market position. Now, we must harness these strengths and put the weight of the organization behind our most important priorities. In the process, we will become more efficient so we can innovate and execute with higher velocity. The opportunity to drive greater impact for our customers and unlock profitable growth makes it an exciting time to be at PayPal."

We’re excited to welcomeJamie Millerto PayPal as our next Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Jamie brings her deep experience as a CFO, strategist, and business leader at global companies such as General Electric, EY, and Cargill. 

Alex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “Jamie is an accomplished CFO and business executive who has worked across many industries and guided both public and private companies through dynamic environments and meaningful transformation during her impressive 33-year career. She brings a proven track record of driving strong financial results, instilling financial and operational discipline, and demonstrating inspirational leadership.”https://payp.al/CFO

Women’s economic empowerment has the power to uplift families, communities and the entire global economy. This week, we announced investments inSweef CapitalandQuona Capitalas part of our $108 million commitment to advance financial inclusion and economic empowerment for women and girls. We're proud to invest in organizations that help fulfill our mission to shape a more inclusive financial services system. These investments are the first of our forthcoming $100 million in capital investments into funds and other initiatives that are led by women or focused on serving women. Learn more about the investments and our overall commitment:https://lnkd.in/gyr2xi5H

Today, we announced the recipients of our 2023 PayPal Maggie Lena Walker Award. Named in honor of the first woman to charter and run a U.S. bank, the award recognizes four women who have charted new paths in their industries, demonstrated a commitment to economically empowering those in their communities, and are ultimately creating a more inclusive world. Congratulations to this year’s recipients:Tulaine M.,Arian Simone,Bree Jones,Omi Bell!  
 
Learn more about our recipients:https://lnkd.in/gktfwB8B#PayPalMLWAward

We’re thrilled to haveAlex Chrisson board as PayPal’s new President and CEO. Alex joined us from Intuit, where he spent more than 20 years working to empower and enable small businesses. Today, he greeted the PayPal community at our global headquarters in San Jose for a special CEO fireside chat with former President and CEODan Schulman. Welcome to PayPal, Alex! 🎉

Today, we announced that customers now have the option to add their eligible PayPal or Venmo credit and debit cards to Apple Wallet. Cardholders will be able to use Apple Pay to make quick and secure payments in-store, online or on their favorite apps while still being able to earn the same cashback and rewards that they love on their eligible purchases they would get with their physical card. Find out more here:https://lnkd.in/gjyyps_Z

PayPal has been named toFortune’s 2023 Change the World list for the fourth consecutive year. Each year, this list features companies with innovative business strategies that positively impact the world. We believe that we have a responsibility to work together to ensure more people and businesses are able to participate in the digital economy safely and securely. We’re proud to be recognized for our work to prioritize safe and secure products, protect our customers, and safeguard the digital economy.https://lnkd.in/g3waUnQ#ChangeTheWorld

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
The posts can be categorized into:

1. **Technological Advancements**: Updates on new features and technical progress.
2. **Ecosystem Updates**: Team integrations, community activities, and partnerships.
3. **Educational Efforts**: Foundational knowledge and transparency in developments.

These themes emphasize growth, innovation, and transparency without manipulative tactics.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Investors seek advanced analytics, cross-chain solutions, and user-friendly onboarding, with concerns about ecosystem updates and governance. They expect continuous innovation and integration, reflecting a demand for sophisticated tools and transparency within the Terra ecosystem.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include frequent ecosystem updates, new integrations like Pulsar Finance, and the Station v3 Dashboard. No controversies are noted, but ongoing growth and innovation through partnerships and new tools are garnering attention.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack patterns of cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. They focus on ecosystem updates, technical advancements, and transparency, without exaggerated claims or promises of high returns.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts exhibit characteristics of automated accounts, such as consistent promotional language, use of emojis, structured links, and lack of personal engagement, indicating they are likely generated by bots.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not contain invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on informational content about the Terra ecosystem, lacking exaggerated claims typical of manipulation schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
The posts can be categorized into:

1. **Technological Advancements**: Highlighting new features and technical progress.
2. **Ecosystem Updates**: Detailing team integrations and community activities.
3. **Educational Efforts**: Providing foundational knowledge and transparency.

These categories influence market trends and investor behavior by showcasing progress, new features, and transparency.

overall_prompt_summary:
The posts are likely generated by automated accounts, focusing on informational content about the Terra ecosystem, including technological advancements, ecosystem updates, and educational efforts. They lack personal engagement and context-specific responses, indicating bot activity.

The most important issues are the consistent promotional language and structured links, which suggest automation, and the absence of manipulative tactics, indicating a legitimate focus on transparency and development. Additionally, the posts highlight ongoing growth and innovation through partnerships and new tools, influencing market trends and investor behavior.

A potential improvement could be incorporating more personal engagement to enhance authenticity and user interaction.

We’re thrilled to announce thatAaron James Websterwill be joining PayPal as Executive Vice President, Chief Enterprise Services Officer on March 18. Aaron has extensive experience leading risk management and global operations for some of the world’s most recognized companies.https://bit.ly/3Pljmiu

We are excited to announce that Amy Bonitatibus has been named Chief Corporate Affairs and Communications Officer. Bonitatibus brings a wealth of experience leading communications in the financial services industry and deep expertise in reputation management to the role. She was most recently the Chief Communications Officer at Wells Fargo and previously served as Chief Communications Officer for Chase.https://lnkd.in/gSaFtyne

At PayPal, we’re committed to harnessing the power of our technology and scale to support charities and help people give back to the causes they care about. We’re excited to share thatPayPal Giving Fundis expanding its partnership withMetato exclusively enable charitable giving on Facebook and Instagram in the US, UK, Australia and Canada.

PayPalreposted this President and CEO, PayPal "Cyber 5" are the most important shopping days of the year for our customers and our team worked around the clock to equip small businesses with the tools they need to make every possible sale and give shoppers the opportunity to buy gifts for their families while saving their hard-earned money. As we pull preliminary numbers from Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday, I'm feeling proud of the pivotal role thatPayPalplays in the world and the impact we’re having in our customers' lives:

🔵  We processed approximately 400M transactions
🔵  We put more than $8M back in our customers’ pockets with cash back and savings (more than $2M on Black Friday alone!)
🔵  Cyber Monday was the single largest shopping day of the year so far with approximately $5.8B in TPV and more than 87M transactions (61K transactions per minute!) 

Setting numbers aside, it makes it very real for us when we hear firsthand from entrepreneurs likeJanine Mastrorilliowner of New York-based handbag company Independent Reign, andLeon Leong 梁志康, founder of Singapore-based watchmaker BOLDR Supply Co. how critical this time has been for them and their gratitude for the role our team plays in supporting them 365 days/year. 
 
So to the PayPal team: THANK YOU for your hard work and dedication. We still have more work to do throughout peak season and beyond, but I’m grateful and encouraged by how we are delivering for our customers when it matters the most. 🙌

It's#GivingTuesday! We're continually inspired by the PayPal community's spirit of generosity. Last year, PayPal processed more than 20 billion dollars in donations. 

As we enter the holiday giving season, we’re providing more ways for people to connect and give to the causes they care about. Whether you’re contributing to a community fundraiser, discovering a new charity to support, or making a micro-donation at checkout, Giving Tuesday and the holiday season is a time to help however you can.

Learn more herehttps://bit.ly/47RTKkb

Happy#SmallBusinessSaturday! Small businesses are an essential part of our communities, and we’re grateful for the small business owners worldwide who choose PayPal to power their businesses. Visit your favorite local business today to celebrate and support all that they do for their communities.

Michelle Gill is joining PayPal as EVP, General Manager of a newly formed Small Business and Financial Services Group.Diego Scottiwill join PayPal as EVP, General Manager of a newly formed Consumer Group and Global Marketing and Communications organization.

Our new executive team reflects our commitment to building a high-performing organization that will create the best possible products and experiences for our customers.

Learn more here:https://lnkd.in/g7VNfCxx

Today we introduced Venmo Groups, the newest feature arriving in the app so users can conveniently track, manage, and settle up multiple expenses among groups like friends, family, roommates, partners, sports leagues and more. Read more here:https://venmo.me/groups

During November, our Serve Employee Resource Group for Veterans and allies celebrates Veterans Month to show appreciation for all those who have served their country. To kick off the month, PayPal President and CEOAlex Chrissshared a special video message with Serve about his personal connection to the community and to thank members for their service.

Our Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) are at the heart of our culture. We recently welcomed our global ERG leaders to San Jose for an engaging and inspiring leadership summit that focused on navigating change and driving impact. Our President and CEOAlex Chrissjoined to discuss the essential role ERGs play in building culture and how best to support these vital communities. Thank you to all our ERG leaders for all you do!

PayPal reported its third quarter results today demonstrating continued progress against our strategic initiatives.https://payp.al/Q3EarningsAlex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “My first 30 days leading PayPal have confirmed my belief in the company's strong assets and market position. Now, we must harness these strengths and put the weight of the organization behind our most important priorities. In the process, we will become more efficient so we can innovate and execute with higher velocity. The opportunity to drive greater impact for our customers and unlock profitable growth makes it an exciting time to be at PayPal."

We’re excited to welcomeJamie Millerto PayPal as our next Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Jamie brings her deep experience as a CFO, strategist, and business leader at global companies such as General Electric, EY, and Cargill. 

Alex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “Jamie is an accomplished CFO and business executive who has worked across many industries and guided both public and private companies through dynamic environments and meaningful transformation during her impressive 33-year career. She brings a proven track record of driving strong financial results, instilling financial and operational discipline, and demonstrating inspirational leadership.”https://payp.al/CFO

Women’s economic empowerment has the power to uplift families, communities and the entire global economy. This week, we announced investments inSweef CapitalandQuona Capitalas part of our $108 million commitment to advance financial inclusion and economic empowerment for women and girls. We're proud to invest in organizations that help fulfill our mission to shape a more inclusive financial services system. These investments are the first of our forthcoming $100 million in capital investments into funds and other initiatives that are led by women or focused on serving women. Learn more about the investments and our overall commitment:https://lnkd.in/gyr2xi5H

Today, we announced the recipients of our 2023 PayPal Maggie Lena Walker Award. Named in honor of the first woman to charter and run a U.S. bank, the award recognizes four women who have charted new paths in their industries, demonstrated a commitment to economically empowering those in their communities, and are ultimately creating a more inclusive world. Congratulations to this year’s recipients:Tulaine M.,Arian Simone,Bree Jones,Omi Bell!  
 
Learn more about our recipients:https://lnkd.in/gktfwB8B#PayPalMLWAward

We’re thrilled to haveAlex Chrisson board as PayPal’s new President and CEO. Alex joined us from Intuit, where he spent more than 20 years working to empower and enable small businesses. Today, he greeted the PayPal community at our global headquarters in San Jose for a special CEO fireside chat with former President and CEODan Schulman. Welcome to PayPal, Alex! 🎉

Today, we announced that customers now have the option to add their eligible PayPal or Venmo credit and debit cards to Apple Wallet. Cardholders will be able to use Apple Pay to make quick and secure payments in-store, online or on their favorite apps while still being able to earn the same cashback and rewards that they love on their eligible purchases they would get with their physical card. Find out more here:https://lnkd.in/gjyyps_Z

PayPal has been named toFortune’s 2023 Change the World list for the fourth consecutive year. Each year, this list features companies with innovative business strategies that positively impact the world. We believe that we have a responsibility to work together to ensure more people and businesses are able to participate in the digital economy safely and securely. We’re proud to be recognized for our work to prioritize safe and secure products, protect our customers, and safeguard the digital economy.https://lnkd.in/g3waUnQ#ChangeTheWorld

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into **Technological Advancements** and **Ecosystem Updates**. They emphasize Terra's technical progress and community news, focusing on transparency, innovation, and ecosystem development without speculative or manipulative content.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Investors value transparency, technical innovation, and ecosystem growth, seeking detailed updates on governance, integrations, and community engagement. They avoid manipulative schemes, preferring clear communication and continuous technological progress.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include frequent ecosystem and governance updates, new integrations, and media features. Notable developments are the Station v3 Dashboard and Pulsar Finance's integration, with no controversies mentioned. Key milestones focus on partnerships and product enhancements.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack patterns of cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. They focus on ecosystem updates and technical advancements without aggressive marketing, guaranteed profits, or pressure to invest quickly.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts show characteristics of being generated by bots due to their lack of personal engagement, consistent promotional language, and inclusion of multiple links, though this is not definitive without further context or behavioral analysis.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts contain no invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and lack signs of manipulation schemes, focusing instead on ecosystem updates and technological advancements without aggressive marketing or guaranteed profits.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts fall under **Technological Advancements** and **Ecosystem Updates**, focusing on Terra's technical progress and community news. They avoid market manipulation tactics and aggressive marketing, reflecting a stable and informative approach to cryptocurrency trends and investor behavior.

overall_prompt_summary: The posts primarily focus on updates and technical advancements within the Terra ecosystem, often displaying characteristics of bot-generated content. They lack personal engagement and use consistent promotional language, including multiple links. The most important issues are the potential bot-like nature of the posts and the absence of aggressive marketing or manipulation tactics. Additionally, the posts highlight significant developments such as the Station v3 Dashboard and Pulsar Finance's integration. A potential improvement would be to increase personal engagement and reduce the repetitive promotional tone to make the content more relatable and authentic.

profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

extracted_posts.post_content: We’re excited to share our biggest U.S. ad campaign ever, starring Will Ferrell. Check out Will’s journey of discovering that he can now shop with PayPal ‘everywhere’ – in stores and online all while earning rewards.https://lnkd.in/ghEeXUgs

PayPal and Venmo are proud partners of this year'sGlobal CitizenFestival in New York City. Revolutionizing commerce globally means making an impact locally. Together, we're spotlighting how our platforms power critical nonprofit donations and offer loans and services to small business owners likeBritney Mossof Cupcake Me! For all those attending or watching from home — enjoy the festival!

PayPal is ushering in a new era, making it easier and more rewarding than ever to shop and pay with PayPal everywhere – both in stores and online – with PayPal Debit.

We’re expanding our rewards program and availability to give our customers a smart choice for every purchase. Customers can now access new and personalized ways to shop and manage their spending, including new 5% cash back rewards on up to $1,000 spend in a monthly category of their choosing with the PayPal Debit Card, stackable rewards in the PayPal app from hundreds of brands, and it’s faster to add the PayPal Debit Card to their mobile wallet in just a few taps to earn rewards with tap-to-pay in stores.

Learn more:https://lnkd.in/enxaf_ex

We’re excited to share the expansion of our strategic partnership withFiserv. Building on our longstanding collaboration, Fiserv merchants can now integrate PayPal,Venmoand other PayPal payment methods more seamlessly through their Commerce Hub. Additionally, Fiserv will introduce Fastlane by PayPal to accelerate guest checkout flows for U.S. merchants.

This#LaborDay, we’re proud to be recognized as one of the Top 10 Companies for Workers byJUST Capital. Our employees are the backbone of our business, and we’re grateful to be recognized for the efforts we’ve made in supporting them.#LaborDay2024

The PayPal USD stablecoin is part of PayPal's mission to revolutionize commerce globally. This weekend, we reached a major milestone: over $1 billion in market capitalization! This is just the beginning, and we’re excited to keep growing for the future.

We’re excited to announceAdyenasPayPal’s first Fastlane payment processor distribution partner. This partnership brings together our brand, trust and scale combined with Adyen’s customer base—to make PayPal available everywhere customers’ shop. This strategic partnership signifies how PayPal is evolving into a "platform of choice " by enabling other processors to thrive and achieve greater success.https://bit.ly/4cAA6LF

We’re delighted to team up withGlobal Citizenand work together to create positive change. We look forward to bringing our collaboration to life at the Global Citizen Festival this fall! Grab your PayPal Exclusive: General Admission today*!  
 
*For a limited time, tickets are available at $99 each, when you checkout with PayPal starting on August 16, 2024 at 10:00AM ET. Offer can be accessed via the Global Citizen Ticketmaster site. Subject to Ticketmaster terms and conditions. This offer may be modified at any time, limited tickets available.https://lnkd.in/eCyg9keh 59,712 followers BIG NEWS🚨 We’re thrilled to share that we are teaming up withPayPal! This collaboration will be an exciting step forward in our mission to drive positive change and amplify our impact – and we can’t wait to do it in lockstep with the PayPal team.  

To celebrate, we’re launching the PayPal Exclusive: General Admission tickets – on sale now for a special price! It’s just one way this collaboration is already bringing new and exciting opportunities to the table – for our organization and for Global Citizens around the world.  

Interested in learning more about General Admission tickets? Head over to this link:https://lnkd.in/e3Z24KYU

We’re excited to announce that PayPal is teaming up withUKGto offer the ability for U.S. employees to set up PayPal Direct Deposit through their employer’s payroll portal. U.S. employees paid through UKG Pro will be able to sign up for a PayPal Balance account and set up PayPal Direct Deposit by clicking the PayPal button on their employer’s payroll portal.  
 
Find out more:https://payp.al/ukg

Introducing Fastlane by PayPal, now available to U.S. businesses of all sizes using PayPal Braintree and PayPal Complete Payments. Fastlane is PayPal’s newest accelerated guest checkout solution, allowing shoppers to enjoy fast and low-friction purchases. 
 
Just in time for the holiday shopping season, Fastlane is easy to integrate and is here to help reduce guest checkout time, increase conversions and expand consumer reach.payp.al/fastlane

We reported second quarter 2024 results today, delivering strong performance that highlights the strength of PayPal’s global commerce platform. We’re making steady progress on our transformation to position the company for long-term, durable, and profitable growth, and we’re executing on the innovations we announced earlier this year. Thanks to the PayPal team for your tireless work to delight our customers every day!   
 
Read more about PayPal’s second quarter results:payp.al/Q2

What a day! The energy, purpose and teamwork throughout our global offices during PayPal Impact Day was palpable. A huge thank you to all the small businesses, nonprofits, Community Impact leaders and PayPal employees whose work made the day an overwhelming success. Watch some of the action from the day here.#PayPalImpactDay

Today is the first ever PayPal Impact Day. Our employees around the world are logging off their computers and rolling up their sleeves to pack goods from small businesses into supply kits for local nonprofits. We’re excited to come together with purpose to make an impact in the places where we live and work. Learn more about PayPal Impact Day here:https://lnkd.in/ggyR_Gu5#PayPalImpactDay

Srini VenkatesanjoinsPayPalon June 24 as our new Chief Technology Officer (CTO). In this role, Venkatesan will lead the development and implementation of technology across the entire PayPal ecosystem, including analytics and data science, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning, infrastructure operations, information security, and product engineering. Welcome, Srini!

We believe strong communities are essential for a thriving global economy. That’s why we're proud to announce the 2024 PayPal Community Impact Grant recipients!  

This year, 77 organizations across 22 countries have been selected to receive grant funding, volunteer support from PayPal employees, and pro bono resources. These grants are part of our ongoing commitment to revolutionize commerce globally by expanding economic opportunity for all. 

Each year, our employees play a pivotal role in this initiative by nominating local nonprofits that align with our mission. We are excited to support these organizations and extend our impact in the communities where we live and work. 

Learn more about some of this year’s grantees:https://bit.ly/3VrGAWu

In our most recent Global All Hands, President and CEOAlex Chrissnamed two colleagues as recipients of the inaugural PayPal Impact Award - our company’s highest honor presented to employees for going above and beyond to make a transformative impact on the business.Alison TicknerandYogesh Mishrawere nominated by their executives and recognized by Alex for demonstrating leadership in ways that motivate everyone around them. We are so grateful for your many contributions to PayPal, Alison and Yogesh – congratulations on your well-deserved recognition!

We are pleased to welcomeFrancis Ebongto the PayPal team as SVP, Chief Service Experience Officer. Francis will be accountable for elevating the customer service experience for our consumers and merchants globally.

We are excited to announce thatSteven Winokerwill join PayPal on May 15 as Senior Vice President, Chief Investor Relations Officer. Steve is a collaborative and trusted strategic advisor, who brings a wealth of experience working with companies during transitions. His broad expertise not only as an equity analyst, but also as an operator, makes him the right leader for this role.https://bit.ly/3y71lPj

We’re excited to share our 2023 PayPal Global Impact Report, which highlights our efforts from the past year to make a positive impact on the communities where we live and work. 🌎 
 
In 2023, we came together to serve our customers and make a difference within our communities by: 
- Providing small businesses with access to capital through financing solutions to help sustain and grow their operations.  
- Reducing our environmental impact 
- Enhancing our product offerings to support our customers’ financial well-being  
- Empowering our employees to give back to their local communities 
- Introducing new fraud protection services to keep our customers’ data safe 
 
Read our latest report ➡️https://bit.ly/3UQQeTI

We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day.

PayPal and Venmo are proud partners of this year'sGlobal CitizenFestival in New York City. Revolutionizing commerce globally means making an impact locally. For all those attending or watching from home — enjoy the festival!

PayPal is ushering in a new era, making it easier and more rewarding than ever to shop and pay with PayPal everywhere – both in stores and online – with PayPal Debit.

We’re expanding our rewards program and availability to give our customers a smart choice for every purchase. Customers can now access new and personalized ways to shop and manage their spending, including new 5% cash back rewards on up to $1,000 spend in a monthly category of their choosing with the PayPal Debit Card, stackable rewards in the PayPal app from hundreds of brands, and it’s faster to add the PayPal Debit Card to their mobile wallet in just a few taps to earn rewards with tap-to-pay in stores.

Learn more:https://lnkd.in/enxaf_ex

Additionally, Fiserv will introduce Fastlane by PayPal to accelerate guest checkout flows for U.S. merchants.

Introducing Fastlane by PayPal, now available to U.S. businesses of all sizes using PayPal Braintree and PayPal Complete Payments. Fastlane is PayPal’s newest accelerated guest checkout solution, allowing shoppers to enjoy fast and low-friction purchases. 
 
Just in time for the holiday shopping season, Fastlane is easy to integrate and is here to help reduce guest checkout time, increase conversions and expand consumer reach.payp.al/fastlane

We reported second quarter 2024 results today, delivering strong performance that highlights the strength of PayPal’s global commerce platform. We’re making steady progress on our transformation to position the company for long-term, durable, and profitable growth, and we’re executing on the innovations we announced earlier this year. Thanks to the PayPal team for your tireless work to delight our customers every day!   
 
Read more about PayPal’s second quarter results:payp.al/Q2

What a day! The energy, purpose and teamwork throughout our global offices during PayPal Impact Day was palpable. Our employees around the world are logging off their computers and rolling up their sleeves to pack goods from small businesses into supply kits for local nonprofits. In this role, Venkatesan will lead the development and implementation of technology across the entire PayPal ecosystem, including analytics and data science, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning, infrastructure operations, information security, and product engineering. Welcome, Srini!

We believe strong communities are essential for a thriving global economy. That’s why we're proud to announce the 2024 PayPal Community Impact Grant recipients!  

This year, 77 organizations across 22 countries have been selected to receive grant funding, volunteer support from PayPal employees, and pro bono resources. These grants are part of our ongoing commitment to revolutionize commerce globally by expanding economic opportunity for all. 

Each year, our employees play a pivotal role in this initiative by nominating local nonprofits that align with our mission. We are excited to support these organizations and extend our impact in the communities where we live and work.

prompts_output.Output: The posts exhibit varied sentence structures, specific URLs, and contextual relevance, lacking repetitive patterns or generic phrasing typical of bots. They focus on genuine ecosystem updates and technical advancements, indicating they are likely human-generated.

prompts_output.Output: The posts do not contain invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on ecosystem updates and technical advancements, showing no signs of manipulation schemes like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes.

PayPalreposted this President and CEO, PayPal "Cyber 5" are the most important shopping days of the year for our customers and our team worked around the clock to equip small businesses with the tools they need to make every possible sale and give shoppers the opportunity to buy gifts for their families while saving their hard-earned money. As we pull preliminary numbers from Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday, I'm feeling proud of the pivotal role thatPayPalplays in the world and the impact we’re having in our customers' lives:

🔵  We processed approximately 400M transactions
🔵  We put more than $8M back in our customers’ pockets with cash back and savings (more than $2M on Black Friday alone!)
🔵  Cyber Monday was the single largest shopping day of the year so far with approximately $5.8B in TPV and more than 87M transactions (61K transactions per minute!) 

Setting numbers aside, it makes it very real for us when we hear firsthand from entrepreneurs likeJanine Mastrorilliowner of New York-based handbag company Independent Reign, andLeon Leong 梁志康, founder of Singapore-based watchmaker BOLDR Supply Co. how critical this time has been for them and their gratitude for the role our team plays in supporting them 365 days/year. 
 
So to the PayPal team: THANK YOU for your hard work and dedication. We still have more work to do throughout peak season and beyond, but I’m grateful and encouraged by how we are delivering for our customers when it matters the most. 🙌

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into "Technological Advancements" (e.g., CosmWasm, Station v3 Extension), "Ecosystem Updates" (e.g., community updates), and "Integrations & Partnerships" (e.g., new features, partnerships), focusing on Terra's development, community engagement, and strategic collaborations in the cryptocurrency space.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Investors focus on technological advancements and ecosystem growth, with concerns about user onboarding and fee management. They expect robust data solutions, continuous development, and community engagement, without signs of manipulation tactics or unrealistic promises.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include ecosystem and governance updates, integrations like Pulsar's, and new features such as the Station v3 Dashboard, focusing on functionality and user engagement. No controversies are mentioned, indicating a positive focus on technological advancements and ecosystem growth.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts show no patterns or strategies resembling cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes, focusing instead on technical advancements, community engagement, and ecosystem growth without unrealistic promises or urgent investment appeals.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts appear human-generated, featuring specific details, updates, and promotional elements typical of human marketing efforts, without signs of generic or repetitive bot-generated content. They focus on technical advancements and community engagement, lacking manipulation tactics or unrealistic promises.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts contain no invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on informational updates, indicating no involvement in manipulation schemes like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts fall into "Technological Advancements," "Ecosystem Updates," and "Integrations & Partnerships," reflecting market trends of innovation and development. They emphasize community engagement and user experience, aligning with investor interest in technological progress and ecosystem growth.

overall_prompt_summary: The outputs highlight emerging trends in the Terra ecosystem, focusing on ecosystem and governance updates, integrations, and media features. Key developments include Pulsar's integration and the Station v3 Dashboard, emphasizing functionality expansion and user engagement. The most important issues include investor interest in technological advancements and ecosystem growth, alongside concerns about user onboarding and fee management. There is a strong focus on community engagement and strategic collaborations, with no signs of manipulation tactics or controversies. Potential improvement could involve enhancing user onboarding processes and optimizing fee management to further support ecosystem growth.

profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

Our CEOAlex Chrissrecently spoke withYahoo Finance’sBrian Sozziabout his first year at PayPal. 
 
Alex said: "The world that we play in – this fintech world – is so dynamic, so interesting with so much competition out there that if you're not moving quickly, if you're not innovating fast, then you're just going to get left behind. And so what I've really been focused on is building the right team, building the right operating system for us to be able to move with velocity."

Watch the full interview here:https://lnkd.in/gp4HT_um?

PayPal is ushering in a new era, making it easier and more rewarding than ever to shop and pay with PayPal everywhere – both in stores and online – with PayPal Debit.

We’re expanding our rewards program and availability to give our customers a smart choice for every purchase. Customers can now access new and personalized ways to shop and manage their spending, including new 5% cash back rewards on up to $1,000 spend in a monthly category of their choosing with the PayPal Debit Card, stackable rewards in the PayPal app from hundreds of brands, and it’s faster to add the PayPal Debit Card to their mobile wallet in just a few taps to earn rewards with tap-to-pay in stores.

Learn more:https://lnkd.in/enxaf_ex

At PayPal, we’re committed to harnessing the power of our technology and scale to support charities and help people give back to the causes they care about. We’re excited to share thatPayPal Giving Fundis expanding its partnership withMetato exclusively enable charitable giving on Facebook and Instagram in the US, UK, Australia and Canada. 
 
PayPal Giving Fund’s mission is to support charities by enabling them to benefit from new forms of giving. PayPalreposted this President and CEO, PayPal "Cyber 5" are the most important shopping days of the year for our customers and our team worked around the clock to equip small businesses with the tools they need to make every possible sale and give shoppers the opportunity to buy gifts for their families while saving their hard-earned money. As we pull preliminary numbers from Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday, I'm feeling proud of the pivotal role thatPayPalplays in the world and the impact we’re having in our customers' lives:

🔵  We processed approximately 400M transactions
🔵  We put more than $8M back in our customers’ pockets with cash back and savings (more than $2M on Black Friday alone!)
🔵  Cyber Monday was the single largest shopping day of the year so far with approximately $5.8B in TPV and more than 87M transactions (61K transactions per minute!) 

Setting numbers aside, it makes it very real for us when we hear firsthand from entrepreneurs likeJanine Mastrorilliowner of New York-based handbag company Independent Reign, andLeon Leong 梁志康, founder of Singapore-based watchmaker BOLDR Supply Co. how critical this time has been for them and their gratitude for the role our team plays in supporting them 365 days/year. 
 
So to the PayPal team: THANK YOU for your hard work and dedication. We still have more work to do throughout peak season and beyond, but I’m grateful and encouraged by how we are delivering for our customers when it matters the most. 🙌

During November, our Serve Employee Resource Group for Veterans and allies celebrates Veterans Month to show appreciation for all those who have served their country. To kick off the month, PayPal President and CEOAlex Chrissshared a special video message with Serve about his personal connection to the community and to thank members for their service.

Our Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) are at the heart of our culture. We recently welcomed our global ERG leaders to San Jose for an engaging and inspiring leadership summit that focused on navigating change and driving impact. Our President and CEOAlex Chrissjoined to discuss the essential role ERGs play in building culture and how best to support these vital communities. Thank you to all our ERG leaders for all you do!

PayPal reported its third quarter results today demonstrating continued progress against our strategic initiatives.https://payp.al/Q3EarningsAlex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “My first 30 days leading PayPal have confirmed my belief in the company's strong assets and market position. Now, we must harness these strengths and put the weight of the organization behind our most important priorities. In the process, we will become more efficient so we can innovate and execute with higher velocity. The opportunity to drive greater impact for our customers and unlock profitable growth makes it an exciting time to be at PayPal."

We’re excited to welcomeJamie Millerto PayPal as our next Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Jamie brings her deep experience as a CFO, strategist, and business leader at global companies such as General Electric, EY, and Cargill. 

Alex Chriss, PayPal President and CEO, said: “Jamie is an accomplished CFO and business executive who has worked across many industries and guided both public and private companies through dynamic environments and meaningful transformation during her impressive 33-year career. She brings a proven track record of driving strong financial results, instilling financial and operational discipline, and demonstrating inspirational leadership.”https://payp.al/CFO

Women’s economic empowerment has the power to uplift families, communities and the entire global economy. This week, we announced investments inSweef CapitalandQuona Capitalas part of our $108 million commitment to advance financial inclusion and economic empowerment for women and girls. We're proud to invest in organizations that help fulfill our mission to shape a more inclusive financial services system. These investments are the first of our forthcoming $100 million in capital investments into funds and other initiatives that are led by women or focused on serving women. Learn more about the investments and our overall commitment:https://lnkd.in/gyr2xi5H

Today, we announced the recipients of our 2023 PayPal Maggie Lena Walker Award. Named in honor of the first woman to charter and run a U.S. bank, the award recognizes four women who have charted new paths in their industries, demonstrated a commitment to economically empowering those in their communities, and are ultimately creating a more inclusive world. Congratulations to this year’s recipients:Tulaine M.,Arian Simone,Bree Jones,Omi Bell!  
 
Learn more about our recipients:https://lnkd.in/gktfwB8B#PayPalMLWAward

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into "Technological Advancements," "Ecosystem Updates," and "Integrations & Partnerships." These themes emphasize Terra's technological progress, community engagement, and strategic collaborations, reflecting trends in cryptocurrency development, governance, and cross-chain analytics.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts indicate investor interest in technological advancements, governance, and partnerships, with concerns about security and usability. Expectations focus on seamless onboarding and innovative solutions, highlighting a trend towards ecosystem growth and community engagement in the cryptocurrency space.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include ecosystem updates, governance, and strategic collaborations. Notable developments are Pulsar's Portfolio and Station v3 Dashboard. Key milestones involve partnerships and CosmWasm's history with Terra. No controversies are mentioned.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts focus on technological advancements and community engagement without promising unrealistic returns or urging immediate investment, showing no patterns or strategies resembling known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts appear structured and promotional, typical of human-generated marketing content, with specific links and calls to action. There's no clear indication of being bot-generated without further evidence.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts contain no invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on updates and integrations, emphasizing technical advancements and community engagement, indicating no involvement in manipulation schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts fall into "Technological Advancements," "Ecosystem Updates," and "Integrations & Partnerships," highlighting trends in cryptocurrency development, community engagement, and strategic collaborations, which influence market trends and investor behavior by emphasizing growth and involvement without manipulation tactics.

overall_prompt_summary: The posts are structured and promotional, typical of human-generated marketing content, focusing on technological advancements and community engagement. They do not show signs of being bot-generated or involve manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump schemes. The content emphasizes updates, integrations, and technical progress without unrealistic investment promises. Emerging trends include ecosystem updates and notable developments like Pulsar's Portfolio and the Station v3 Dashboard. Potential improvement could involve providing more evidence to definitively determine if the posts are bot-generated.

profile_bio:
We're championing possibilities for all by making money fast, easy, and more enjoyable. Our hope is unlock opportunities for people in their everyday lives and empower the millions of people and businesses around the world who trust, rely, and use PayPal every day. 

For support, visit the PayPal Help Center. https://payp.al/help

For employment opportunities, check out our job openings in the 'Jobs' tab. We're an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity, and offer generous benefits to help you thrive at work and in your free time.

extracted_posts.post_content: We’re excited to share our biggest U.S. ad campaign ever, starring Will Ferrell. Check out Will’s journey of discovering that he can now shop with PayPal ‘everywhere’ – in stores and online all while earning rewards.https://lnkd.in/ghEeXUgs

Our CEOAlex Chrissrecently spoke withYahoo Finance’sBrian Sozziabout his first year at PayPal. 
 
Alex said: "The world that we play in – this fintech world – is so dynamic, so interesting with so much competition out there that if you're not moving quickly, if you're not innovating fast, then you're just going to get left behind. And so what I've really been focused on is building the right team, building the right operating system for us to be able to move with velocity."

Watch the full interview here:https://lnkd.in/gp4HT_um?

PayPal and Venmo are proud partners of this year'sGlobal CitizenFestival in New York City. Revolutionizing commerce globally means making an impact locally. Together, we're spotlighting how our platforms power critical nonprofit donations and offer loans and services to small business owners likeBritney Mossof Cupcake Me! For all those attending or watching from home — enjoy the festival!

PayPal is ushering in a new era, making it easier and more rewarding than ever to shop and pay with PayPal everywhere – both in stores and online – with PayPal Debit.

We’re expanding our rewards program and availability to give our customers a smart choice for every purchase. Customers can now access new and personalized ways to shop and manage their spending, including new 5% cash back rewards on up to $1,000 spend in a monthly category of their choosing with the PayPal Debit Card, stackable rewards in the PayPal app from hundreds of brands, and it’s faster to add the PayPal Debit Card to their mobile wallet in just a few taps to earn rewards with tap-to-pay in stores.

Learn more:https://lnkd.in/enxaf_ex

We’re excited to share the expansion of our strategic partnership withFiserv. Building on our longstanding collaboration, Fiserv merchants can now integrate PayPal,Venmoand other PayPal payment methods more seamlessly through their Commerce Hub. Additionally, Fiserv will introduce Fastlane by PayPal to accelerate guest checkout flows for U.S. merchants.

This#LaborDay, we’re proud to be recognized as one of the Top 10 Companies for Workers byJUST Capital. Our employees are the backbone of our business, and we’re grateful to be recognized for the efforts we’ve made in supporting them.#LaborDay2024

The PayPal USD stablecoin is part of PayPal's mission to revolutionize commerce globally. This weekend, we reached a major milestone: over $1 billion in market capitalization! This is just the beginning, and we’re excited to keep growing for the future.

We’re excited to announceAdyenasPayPal’s first Fastlane payment processor distribution partner. This partnership brings together our brand, trust and scale combined with Adyen’s customer base—to make PayPal available everywhere customers’ shop. This strategic partnership signifies how PayPal is evolving into a "platform of choice " by enabling other processors to thrive and achieve greater success.https://bit.ly/4cAA6LF

We’re excited to announce that PayPal is teaming up withUKGto offer the ability for U.S. employees to set up PayPal Direct Deposit through their employer’s payroll portal. U.S. employees paid through UKG Pro will be able to sign up for a PayPal Balance account and set up PayPal Direct Deposit by clicking the PayPal button on their employer’s payroll portal.  
 
Find out more:https://payp.al/ukg

Introducing Fastlane by PayPal, now available to U.S. businesses of all sizes using PayPal Braintree and PayPal Complete Payments. Fastlane is PayPal’s newest accelerated guest checkout solution, allowing shoppers to enjoy fast and low-friction purchases. 
 
Just in time for the holiday shopping season, Fastlane is easy to integrate and is here to help reduce guest checkout time, increase conversions and expand consumer reach.payp.al/fastlane

We reported second quarter 2024 results today, delivering strong performance that highlights the strength of PayPal’s global commerce platform. We’re making steady progress on our transformation to position the company for long-term, durable, and profitable growth, and we’re executing on the innovations we announced earlier this year. Thanks to the PayPal team for your tireless work to delight our customers every day!   
 
Read more about PayPal’s second quarter results:payp.al/Q2

What a day! The energy, purpose and teamwork throughout our global offices during PayPal Impact Day was palpable. A huge thank you to all the small businesses, nonprofits, Community Impact leaders and PayPal employees whose work made the day an overwhelming success. Watch some of the action from the day here.#PayPalImpactDay

Our employees around the world are logging off their computers and rolling up their sleeves to pack goods from small businesses into supply kits for local nonprofits. Srini VenkatesanjoinsPayPalon June 24 as our new Chief Technology Officer (CTO). In this role, Venkatesan will lead the development and implementation of technology across the entire PayPal ecosystem, including analytics and data science, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning, infrastructure operations, information security, and product engineering. Welcome, Srini!

We believe strong communities are essential for a thriving global economy. That’s why we're proud to announce the 2024 PayPal Community Impact Grant recipients!  

This year, 77 organizations across 22 countries have been selected to receive grant funding, volunteer support from PayPal employees, and pro bono resources. These grants are part of our ongoing commitment to revolutionize commerce globally by expanding economic opportunity for all. 

Each year, our employees play a pivotal role in this initiative by nominating local nonprofits that align with our mission. We are excited to support these organizations and extend our impact in the communities where we live and work. 

Learn more about some of this year’s grantees:https://bit.ly/3VrGAWu

In our most recent Global All Hands, President and CEOAlex Chrissnamed two colleagues as recipients of the inaugural PayPal Impact Award - our company’s highest honor presented to employees for going above and beyond to make a transformative impact on the business.Alison TicknerandYogesh Mishrawere nominated by their executives and recognized by Alex for demonstrating leadership in ways that motivate everyone around them. We are so grateful for your many contributions to PayPal, Alison and Yogesh – congratulations on your well-deserved recognition!

We are pleased to welcomeFrancis Ebongto the PayPal team as SVP, Chief Service Experience Officer. Francis will be accountable for elevating the customer service experience for our consumers and merchants globally.

Steve is a collaborative and trusted strategic advisor, who brings a wealth of experience working with companies during transitions. His broad expertise not only as an equity analyst, but also as an operator, makes him the right leader for this role.https://bit.ly/3y71lPj

We’re excited to share our 2023 PayPal Global Impact Report, which highlights our efforts from the past year to make a positive impact on the communities where we live and work. 🌎 
 
In 2023, we came together to serve our customers and make a difference within our communities by: 
- Providing small businesses with access to capital through financing solutions to help sustain and grow their operations.  
- Reducing our environmental impact 
- Enhancing our product offerings to support our customers’ financial well-being  
- Empowering our employees to give back to their local communities 
- Introducing new fraud protection services to keep our customers’ data safe 
 
Read our latest report ➡️https://bit.ly/3UQQeTI

We’re excited to announce that Shaun Khalfan is joining PayPal today as Chief Information Security Officer. Shaun brings more than 20 years of experience in information security and risk management, including serving as Chief Information Security Officer with the U.S Department of Homeland Security, Discover Financial Services, Barclays International, and Freddie Mac.

We’re thrilled to announce thatAaron James Websterwill be joining PayPal as Executive Vice President, Chief Enterprise Services Officer on March 18. Aaron has extensive experience leading risk management and global operations for some of the world’s most recognized companies.https://bit.ly/3Pljmiu

We are excited to announce that Amy Bonitatibus has been named Chief Corporate Affairs and Communications Officer. Bonitatibus brings a wealth of experience leading communications in the financial services industry and deep expertise in reputation management to the role. She was most recently the Chief Communications Officer at Wells Fargo and previously served as Chief Communications Officer for Chase.https://lnkd.in/gSaFtyne

We are excited to announce thatGeoff Seeleyhas joined PayPal as Chief Marketing Officer. Seeley brings over 25 years in global brand, digital, and performance marketing, while building teams to drive transformative marketing models. Seeley was most recently the Global CMO and Communications Officer at Afterpay and in marketing at CashApp.https://lnkd.in/eBDxuf3x
